long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power and mystery of the legendary black dragon with this epic start page theme! Each new tab immerses you in a world of dark fantasy, featuring dramatic and awe-inspiring images of a black dragon in all its fierce, majestic glory. From its piercing eyes to its powerful wings, these visuals capture the essence of a creature born of myth and magic, shrouded in shadows yet radiating undeniable strength. Perfect for fans of epic fantasy and dragon lore, this theme adds a sense of grandeur and intensity to your browsing experience, making each new tab feel like an entrance into a world of power, mystery, and ancient forces. 
This extension lets you to chose your search engine.
